plot: In an other kind of 20th century, the Texan's Ultra-Christian forces take over North America. A Montreal Milice non- commissioned officer has to face this totalitarian society.
title: Rebellion
plot_es: In an other kind of 20th century, the Texan's Ultra-Christian forces take over North America. A Montreal Milice non- commissioned officer has to face this totalitarian society.
